trans-unit.source: A class that serializes a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instance to and from RSS 2.0 format.

Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> and to create an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> from an XML document that represents an RSS 2.0 item.
If you have derived a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> and want to serialize it, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter%601> formatter.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter"></xref> class.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> to serialize.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to specify a class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> to instantiate when a syndication item is read in.
The instance derived from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter"></xref>.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter"></xref> class.

If the `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, all elements defined in the Atom 1.0 specification that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification are serialized with the Atom 1.0 namespace.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> to serialize.
A value that specifies whether to serialize elements that are defined in the Atom 1.0 specification but not in the RSS 2.0 specification.
The default value is `true`.
Verifies whether the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> contains a valid RSS 2.0 syndication item.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
A value that specifies if the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> contains a valid RSS 2.0 syndication item.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instance.
The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance is not automatically associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter> used to create it.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instance.
Gets the type of the syndication item associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter"></xref>.
The type of the syndication item associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
The default value of this property is `true`.
Attribute extensions are XML attributes that are not defined in the Atom 1.0 specification.
This property determines whether to write these attributes during serialization.

Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve attribute extensions inside the `AttributeExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 item.
A value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
The default value of this property is `true`.
Element extensions are XML elements that are not defined in the Atom 1.0 specification.
This property determines whether to write these elements during serialization.

Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve element extensions inside the `ElementExtensions` property in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 item.
A value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
Reads an RSS 2.0 syndication item from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.
The default value of this property is `true`.

When this property is `true`, any properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> class that cannot be represented in the RSS 2.0 format are serialized within the Atom 1.0 namespace; otherwise these properties are not be serialized.
A value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.
Gets the syndication version used by the formatter.
[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] supports Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0 syndication versions.
The syndication version used by the formatter.

Writes the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema"></xref> method.
Override this method to return your own schema.
`Null`.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)"></xref> method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> used to read the XML document.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)"></xref> method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> used to write XML node.
